languages.text: "Конечно, идея использования машины, способной контактировать с голосами варпа без астропатов, может показаться соблазнительной, но... Машина эта полна скверны. Ее баки полны топлива из разжиженных душ ваших подданных. Их хватит надолго, но... однажды придется ее дозаправить".

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, идея использования машины, способной контактировать с голосами варпа без астропатов, может показаться соблазнительной, но... Машина эта полна скверны. Ее баки полны топлива из разжиженных душ ваших подданных. Их хватит надолго, но... однажды придется ее дозаправить".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of astropaths to contact the voices of the Warp may seem tempting, but... This machine is full of corruption. Its fuel tanks are full of fuel made of the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... Someday it will have to be refilled."

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of astropaths to contact the voices of the Warp may seem tempting, but... This machine is full of corruption. Its fuel tanks are full of fuel made of the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... Someday it will have to be refilled."

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

"Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

languages.text: “当然，使用机器取代星语者，通过亚空间进行联系的想法听起来确实很诱人，但……这台机器充斥着腐化。它油箱的燃料是由您的臣民的液化灵魂制成的。到目前为止，这些燃料还能满足机器运转的消耗，但……总有一天，油箱会需要重新填入新的灵魂燃料。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

traits.locale_text: “当然，使用机器取代星语者，通过亚空间进行联系的想法听起来确实很诱人，但……这台机器充斥着腐化。它油箱的燃料是由您的臣民的液化灵魂制成的。到目前为止，这些燃料还能满足机器运转的消耗，但……总有一天，油箱会需要重新填入新的灵魂燃料。”

languages.text: «Por supuesto, la idea de usar una máquina en lugar de Astrópatas para contactar con las voces de la disformidad puede parecer tentadora, pero... esta máquina está llena de corrupción. Sus tanques de combustible están repletos de las almas licuadas de sus súbditos. Tiene suficiente por ahora, pero... algún día tendrá que rellenarse».
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, la idea de usar una máquina en lugar de Astrópatas para contactar con las voces de la disformidad puede parecer tentadora, pero... esta máquina está llena de corrupción. Sus tanques de combustible están repletos de las almas licuadas de sus súbditos. Tiene suficiente por ahora, pero... algún día tendrá que rellenarse».

languages.text: 「もちろん、感応通信官の代わりに機械を使って<歪み>の声と接触を図るというアイデアは魅力的かもしれませんが...この機械は腐敗に満ちています。燃料タンクは、あなたの兵の液化した魂で満たされています。今は十分な量がありますが...いつの日か補充しなければならなくなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、感応通信官の代わりに機械を使って<歪み>の声と接触を図るというアイデアは魅力的かもしれませんが...この機械は腐敗に満ちています。燃料タンクは、あなたの兵の液化した魂で満たされています。今は十分な量がありますが...いつの日か補充しなければならなくなるでしょう」

languages.text: « Si l'idée de remplacer les astropathes par une machine pour entrer en contact avec les voix du Warp peut être tentante, il faut savoir que cet... appareil est rongé par la corruption. Ses réservoirs de carburant sont emplis des âmes liquéfiées de vos sujets. Ils sont pleins pour le moment, mais... il faudra les remplir à nouveau un jour. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'idée de remplacer les astropathes par une machine pour entrer en contact avec les voix du Warp peut être tentante, il faut savoir que cet... appareil est rongé par la corruption. Ses réservoirs de carburant sont emplis des âmes liquéfiées de vos sujets. Ils sont pleins pour le moment, mais... il faudra les remplir à nouveau un jour. »

languages.text: "Natürlich mag der Gedanke verlockend erscheinen, die Stimmen des Warp nicht durch Astropathen, sondern mittels einer Maschine zu kontaktieren, aber ... diese Maschine ist voller Verderbnis. Ihre Treibstofftanks werden mit den verflüssigten Seelen Eurer Untertanen gefüllt. Noch sind sie voll, doch ... eines Tages wird man sie nachfüllen müssen."
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich mag der Gedanke verlockend erscheinen, die Stimmen des Warp nicht durch Astropathen, sondern mittels einer Maschine zu kontaktieren, aber ... diese Maschine ist voller Verderbnis. Ihre Treibstofftanks werden mit den verflüssigten Seelen Eurer Untertanen gefüllt. Noch sind sie voll, doch ... eines Tages wird man sie nachfüllen müssen."

languages.text: "Öteboyut sesleriyle iletişim kurmak için Astropatlar yerine bir makine kullanma fikri akla yatkın gibi görünse de... Bu makineden yozluk akıyor. Yakıt tankları, tebaanızın sıvılaşmış ruhlarıyla beslenmekte. Şimdilik yeterli yakıtı olsa da... Günün birinde depoların doldurulması gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "Of course, the idea of using a machine instead of Astropaths to contact the voices of the warp may seem tempting, but... this machine is teeming with corruption. Its fuel tanks are satiated with the liquefied souls of your subjects. It has enough for now, but... someday it will have to be refilled."
